H0.text: LOT is the national airline of which country. Latvia

H1.text: LOT is the national airline of which country. Lithuania

H2.text: LOT is the national airline of which country. Estonia

H3.text: LOT is the national airline of which country. Polnd

A4.text: LOT Polish Airlines, legally Polskie Linie Lotnicze LOT S.A. (Polish pronunciation: [l…ît], flight), is the flag carrier of Poland.

A5.text: The airline was founded on 29 December 1928 by the Polish government during the Second Polish Republic as a self-governing limited liability corporation.
